review: Easy to use. Surprised that there is still a rental fee for some movies. Have not tried Netflix or other options__ fearing more fees!
author: charlene m. earles

review: Seems to have a lot of features and programs that I am not familiar with. A starter manual would be helpful. Easy to install, but confusing to connect. Starter manual will help with that.
author: mal buckey

review: Love being able to watch all my shows on Netflix, etc. and Amazon Prime!
author: Ro Sandor

review: It very wonderful product, but the shipping is very expensive....
author: nebiyou

review: I originally ordered an amazon fire modem that did not work properly out of the box. Amazon is not set up to call for assistance so I returned the item and ordered a Firestick. The Firestick  hooked up and works perfectly so I am upset that I was not given a full refund for the original modem. I was sent a defective product and was not given a full refund.
author: Veronica Amenedo

review: Easy to hook up and use.  Outstanding addition to your tv
author: tom mcculley

review: I absolutley love the Fire TV Stick. it's so simple to install and start using right away that anyone can do it.  I have been using it for a week now and I enjoy the ease of watching my movies on the TV instead of my laptop. I have quite a few on my "Watch List" that i'm planning to watch with my granddaughters. The selection on the Amazon library it's great. I have not use the other options on the Fire Stick like streaming my pictures and home videos yet.
author: Yhoney

review: Much easier to use than Apple TV! A must if you have Amazon Prime.
author: K. B. Moynihan
